About Us

Your pleasure is our business.

Kirkendoll is an adult entertainment management company. We don’t run clubs; we create experiences.

Like your favorite suit, your Kirkendoll club experience is tailored to your tastes. Take in the views onstage, or enjoy the privacy of a sleek VIP suite at any of our premier properties, including the world-famous Penthouse Club in New Orleans.

You’ll find that the hours pass easily in the company of our stunning entertainers — but if we’re doing our job right, you’ll never see us.

Adult entertainment is an age-old enjoyment. Come see how we’re making it new.

Our Approach

Team

Our Team

With a combined 90 years of industry experience, the Kirkendoll Management team forms the financial, legal, and marketing backbone of our properties.

A lot of effort goes into creating the effortless elegance of a Kirkendoll club. Meet the people building our vision.

Community

Charities

Kirkendoll Management is glad to support charitable organizations in the Gulf South region. Our hope is that by contributing both financial assistance and our time and energy, we can help our partners solve problems like homelessness, socioeconomic disadvantage, and lack of health services.

By bringing greater awareness and attention to these issues, we’ll help make the South a better place to live. Here are a few of the organizations we regularly support.
